content:
Yes, here are some dessert places in the area that offer gluten-free and vegan options alongside their other offerings:

1. The Sweet Spot: This bakery offers a range of gluten-free and vegan options, including cookies, cakes, and cupcakes.

2. Angelina's Bakery & Sweet Shop: This bakery offers a variety of gluten-free and vegan cakes, cupcakes, and pastries.

3. Lulu's Sweet Shop: This candy store offers a range of vegan and gluten-free candy options, including dairy-free chocolate.

4. Schmucker's Bakery: This bakery offers a variety of gluten-free and vegan baked goods, including specialty cakes.

5. Caravan of Dreams: This vegan restaurant has an entire dessert menu with gluten-free and vegan options, including raw and gluten-free desserts.

6. Leaf Vegetarian Restaurant: This restaurant has a dessert menu that includes vegan and gluten-free options.

7. Sweet Art Cupcakes: This bakery offers gluten-free and vegan cupcakes, as well as regular cupcakes.

I hope this helps your friend find something delicious to enjoy!
